testgroup.title: Injection warning light ON check

test1.ptxt: Turn ignition switch to ON position.

testgroup.question: Does injection warning light (1) come on?

action.ptxt: Go to Injection Warning Light Does Not Come ON with Ignition Switch ON and Engine Stop .

testgroup.title: Injection warning light flash check
testgroup.question: Does injection warning light flash on and off continuously in Step 1?

testgroup.title: ICM communication check

test1.ptxt: Connect SUZUKI scan tool with turn ignition switch to OFF position.
Check ICM for DTC referring to Diagnostic Trouble Code (DTC) Check .

testgroup.question: Is communication between ICM and SUZUKI scan tool available?

action.ptxt: Go to applicable DTC diag. flow.

test1.ptxt: Check the following terminal voltage on ICM connector referring to Inspection of Immobilizer Control Module (ICM) and Its Circuit .

item.ptxt: Serial communication line of data link connector

action.ptxt: Substitute a known-good ICM and recheck.

testgroup.title: Injection warning light remain ON check

test1.ptxt: Check if injection warning light remains ON after engine start.

testgroup.question: Does injection warning light remain ON after engine start?

action.ptxt: Go to Injection Warning Light Remains ON after Engine Start .
Immobilizer control system is in good condition.
